document.heading: D.C. Solid Waste Management and Multi-Material Recycling Act of 1988

history.narrative: Law 7-226, the “D.C. Solid Waste Management and Multi-Material Recycling Act of 1988,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-378, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 29, 1988 and December 13, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 10, 1989, it was assigned Act No. 7-301 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
